attributes.action: Exempt Retained Firefighters and other part-time Emergency Services Personnel from the higher rate (40%) tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Retained Firefighters, who also hold a full-time job, have their wages taxed at the 40% rate as it is considered a 'second job'. These brave men and women do this job as a service to the communities in which they live and not wholly as a means of gaining an income.
